Package main.java.scheduler.model

Class Schedule

java.lang.Object
main.java.scheduler.model.Schedule
public class Schedule extends Object
Contains the schedule of appointments. Provides methods to access and manipulate appointments. Stores appointments on observable lists, depending on appointment date.

  • Field Summary

    • createAppointment

      public static void createAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, String start, String end, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      Constructs an appointment and adds it to the database.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the appointment
      description - the description of the appointment
      location - the location of the appointment
      contactId - the contactId associated with the appointment
      type - the type of the appointment
      start - the start datetime of the appointment
      end - the end datetime of the appointment
      customerId - the customerId associated with the appointment
      userId - the userId who created the appointment

    • updateAppointment

      Updates the details of an Appointment with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the appointmentId of the appointment
      title - the title of the appointment
      description - the description of the appointment
      location - the location of the appointment
      type - the type of the appointment
      start - the start datetime of the appointment
      end - the end datetime of the appointment
      customerId - the customerId associated with the appointment
      userId - the userId who created the appointment
      contactId - the contactId associated with the appointment
